name: Lovely Pijama
description:
))) SOUND ON (((

- get ready for that special time when you put your lovely pijama and float into a dream.

why is that lupa over there?
 - what is lupa?
 - - The magnifiyng glass

so you can watch the minisapiens going down the screw dive to the dream land.

- I wish I could live there...

There's no point in dreaming without weaking up

There's no point in living without taking a walk around dreamland.

live, love, leave.

### read the oracle of night by Sidarta Ribeiro, it's one of the best readings of last year and it's available in english now ###
